info.title: Action Service REST API Documentation and Client
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for the Voyent Action Service. It's also a dynamic client that you can use to exercise the API

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account under which one or more realms are managed.

get.description: Retrieve a single specific record associated with the resourceId.

200.description: Returns a single, specific record uniquely identified by the resourceId

post.description: Save a specific Action using the provided resourceId as the key.

parameters.name: exec
parameters.description: Execute the query, instead of saving one

201.description: The URI representing the location of the resource.  The value is passed back in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

delete.description: Delete a specific Action identified by the resourceId .

204.description: Indicates that the resource was successfully deleted.

put.description: Save a specific Action using the provided resourceId as the key. This takes the client version as verbatim

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A copy of the resource to be updated.

201.description: The URI representing the location of the resource.  The value is passed back in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account under which one or more realms are managed.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string for finding a set of actions. Default {} (find all)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit clause for the number of actions to get

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A fields clause for retrieving a certain projection

get.summary: Retrieve any action scripts that match the query parameters
get.description: Retrieve the set of actions found by the query.

200.description: Returns an array of Action records that match the query

delete.description: Delete a set of actions that are selected by a query. Be careful! This operation cannot be undone

204.description: Indicates that the resources were successfully deleted.

Action.description: An action consists of tasks, grouped under taskGroups. TBD.
